mapper.insert: insert into member_admin (admin_id, admin_name, admin_password, login_times, real_name, admin_phone, admin_icon_id, login_datetime, gmt_create) values (#{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER} #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminIconId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update member_admin
admin_name = #{adminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
admin_password = #{adminPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
login_times = login_times + 1,
real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
admin_phone = #{adminPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
admin_icon_id = #{adminIconId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
login_datetime = #{loginDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update member_admin set admin_name = #{adminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_password = #{adminPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_times = #{loginTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_phone = #{adminPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_icon_id = #{adminIconId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_datetime = #{loginDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from member_admin where ( admin_name = #{admin_name} and admin_password = #{admin_password} ) or ( admin_phone = #{admin_name} and admin_password = #{admin_password} )
